review: I was recently prescribed Doxepin for insomnia. I took my very first dose last night and I'm happy to admit that I got 7 hours of rest. This morning I feel fully rejuvenated and that in itself is saying something. It took approximately an hour and a half to make me drowsy enough to close my eyes and fall to sleep. Doxepin is a game changer for people that aren't able to get a full night of uninterrupted rest. Best wishes...

I started with 20mg as 10 wasn’t effective at first, but I have been able to reduce back to 10mg over the past month with good success. 20mg did leave me with a ‘hangover’ effect in the mornings, but at least I got a solid stretch of sleep!!
